nodes.natText: You are an single farmer that has gotten bored with his mundane life. So you decide to sell your house and land to set out for an adventure. What do you do next?
After a long journey, you finally reach the town. Where do you go next?

options.altText: You viste the tavern and order a drink... and other... and other. Soon you are low on money and leave the tavern completely drunk.

nodes.natText: You viste the seaport and talk to the quartermaster. You soon find out that he has 3 ships for sale and sensing the oppurity, you ofter to buy one.

options.altText: That boat is too expensive. You must offer to buy other one.

nodes.natText: You use the last of your money and buy the boat. You spent the rest of you life as a traveling merchant
Soon After you take off, a HUGE wave smashes you boat into pieces and you soon drown. Your death was slow and painful

You somehow manage to get an audience with the king and you offer to become a knight. He is impressed by your braveness and grants you request. The live the rest of your life as the king's personal body guard.
